mapper.select: SELECT L.SCHEDULE_NM , S.SCHEDULE_CL , S.EXECUT_CYCLE , S.SCHEDULE_DSC , S.OBJECT_NM , S.TRIGGER_NM , S.LOCK_YN , S.LOCK_CYCLE , S.USE_YN , S.RGST_ID , S.RGST_DT , S.MODI_ID , S.MODI_DT , L.SERVER_IP , L.RGST_DT AS LOCK_RGST_DT , CASE WHEN L.RGST_DT + S.LOCK_CYCLE::INTERVAL < NOW() THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS LOCK_STOP_YN FROM T_MGR_SYS_SCHEDULE_LOCK L JOIN T_MGR_SYS_SCHEDULE S ON L.SCHEDULE_NM = S.SCHEDULE_NM ORDER BY S.SCHEDULE_CL, S.SCHEDULE_NM
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM PTL.T_MGR_SYS_SCHEDULE_LOCK WHERE SCHEDULE_NM = #{scheduleNm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PTL.T_MGR_SYS_SCHEDULE_LOCK (SCHEDULE_NM, SCHEDULE_CL, SERVER_IP, RGST_DT) VALUES (#{scheduleNm}, #{scheduleCl}, #{serverIp}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_NM , SCHEDULE_CL , EXECUT_CYCLE , SCHEDULE_DSC , OBJECT_NM , TRIGGER_NM , LOCK_YN , LOCK_CYCLE , USE_YN , RGST_ID , RGST_DT , MODI_ID , MODI_DT FROM T_MGR_SYS_SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_NM = #{scheduleNm}
